content:
Can we get json schema to download for PDex Plan Net IG, just like its available on FHIR R4 at this url - http://hl7.org/fhir/fhir.schema.json.zip
The download available on PlanNet https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-plan-net/definitions.json.zip is not in the similar format of HL7 R4. Can we get in similar format?
JSON Schemas are not generated for Implementation Guides. Please see: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179252-IG-creation/topic/JSON.20schema
Thanks @Corey Spears , it helps !! As a follow up question, what is the best way to build IG's schema so that coding can be faster?

Technically the FHIR Schema applies to all implementations of FHIR. There is not a lot that can be expressed in a JSON schema to further narrow down what is in an IG like slicing, vocab, and invariants. Is there something specific you are trying to do?
Nothing special, just thinking if anything available to identify and code for extensions.
